title: Psychedelic Type in Illustrator?
content:
hi guys,

I have been dying to figure out how to do psychedelic type in illustrator without having to hand draw them one by one, and I still havnt figure it out.

can anyone help me out here?

an example of psychedelic type:  
 [http://www.letraset.com/design/INFORMATIONPAGES/PROFILES/WesWilson/psych...](http://web.archive.org/web/20130619185327/http:/www.letraset.com/design/INFORMATIONPAGES/PROFILES/WesWilson/psychart01.gif "http://www.letraset.com/design/INFORMATIONPAGES/PROFILES/WesWilson/psychart01.gif")
author: Darkz

comments.content: Draw a rough sketch, then do most of the heavy lifting with an envelope distort, then trace final designs over that, and then go back and finish it. You aren’t going to get around doing some old-fashioned drawing.
